attributes.action: Remove and ban Michael Owen from commentating on live football
attributes.additional_details: Ban Michael Owen from all commentary and punditry on any live football games. The paying public should not have to be subjected to the absolute dross and drivel that pours out of that ridiculous and boring man and the fact we have to pay to listen to that is outrageous. The public cannot listen to that man anymore it is morally wrong! We call on the government to act on behalf of the public and spare us from this atrocity
